name: kdocbuild
author: Nate Steiner <nate@natesteiner.com> (http://natesteiner.com)
description: SCSS build and PHP preview for kdoc Kirby theme

scripts.build: node-sass assets/scss/main.scss | postcss --use autoprefixer -c postcss.json | cssmin > assets/css/main.css
scripts.watch: nodemon -e scss -w assets/scss --exec npm run build
scripts.dev: parallelshell "npm run serve -s" "npm run watch -s" "npm run open:dev -s"
